name: Zombaliens (itch)
description:
Aliens invaded earth and turned everyone into zombies !

Zombaliens is a hybrid of retro FPS and immersive sim, it's the fast, straightforward gameplay of retro FPS in non-linear, highly interactive maps, so you can play in different ways. You can even use stealth or kill everyone by throwing chairs at them (though it may not be the most effective). Also features fire and electricity propagation and a shrinker weapon.

Demo features 3 levels from episode 1 and 2 including a boss fight.

The game is available in early access on Steam and currently features the first 2 episodes. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1653260/Zombaliens
